name: shock-drive
effect:
Held by genesect
:   Holder's buster is yellow, and its techno blast is electric-type.
short_effect: Grants Genesect a yellow, Electric-type Techno Blast.

flavor_text_entries.black-white:
A cassette to be held by Genesect.
It changes Techno Blast to an
Electric-type move.
